JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Description 

Company Background : 

 Proziod Analytics (OPC) PVT Ltd is a start- up based in Bangalore focussed on providing development 

 and analytical services to clients globally. Our competency lies in solving complex domain problems by 

 leveraging technology and developing innovative solutions to create budgeting,  tendering and data mining 

 solutions. 



Nature of the job: 

 We are looking for software developers who can develop and maintain Bill Processing (Parsing) 

 applications for an international client. 

 Develop and maintain parsers that can effectively convert a structured data type into a normalized format. 

 Liaise with onsite technical team in understanding requirements and code to specifications. 



Requirements: 

 Strong Regular Expression skills 

 Familiarity with tools of trade (Visual Studio,  Git) 

 Experience with SQL Server and demonstrated proficiency with SQL,  stored procedures and 

 scripts 

 Dedication to develop high quality software with attention to detail 

 Familiarity with TDD environment. ie. xUnit/ nUnit 

 ASP.Net MVC 

 C# 

 GIT 

 NHibernate/ EF 

 AngularJs 

 CoffeeScript (nice to have)
